definition: Great Cold, 24th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 20th January-3rd February
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
cold/poor/to tremble

sentences.english: Why not call it the Big Chill or the Nippy era?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不管这叫“大寒”或者“冷冻时代”？

sentences.english: It is a folk festival, eat dumplings slight.
sentences.chinese: 有一句民谣叫“大寒小寒，吃饺子过年。”

sentences.english: Hanpo Pavilion is an ideal place to view the sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 大寒坡亭是观日出的理想场所。

sentences.english: Bangzies claim that they are from a cold and big ghostdom.
sentences.chinese: 棒子说它们来自大寒冥国。

sentences.english: Every year ham is made between the winter solstice and the great cold of the Chinese lunar calendar.
sentences.chinese: 每年冬至到大寒，是老黄父子制作火腿的最佳时间。

sentences.english: Why not cry it the Big Chill or the Nippy epoch?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不管这叫大寒或者冷冻时代？

definition: Lesser Cold, 23rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-19th January
solar term
Winter Solstice, 22nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd December-5th January
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
Dashu or Great Heat, 12th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd July-6th August
Shuangjiang or Frost Descends, 18th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd October-6th November
midwinter/the depth of winter
the twenty seven days after the Winter Solstice, reputed to be the coldest days of the year
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
Xiazhi or Summer Solstice, 10th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st June-6th July
the 24 solar terms, calculated from the position of the sun on the ecliptic, that divide the year into 24 equal periods
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
